column5: Anybody suggest a good Walleye charter on Erie down Pelee Island / Leamington way for June sometime?
.  Sorry....thought I knew of an OFC'er out that way....but had the wrong guy.
jp fishing paul powis he is the guy with dave doing the subway nights 519-745-1992 he fishes out of erieau

I saw this charter boat on the Coronzey show a while back.  I remember it because he was casting to walleye( countdown method )and catching 'em that way.  Just looked way more fun than trolling.  Anyhoo, here's the website to find out more.  www.chantecharters.com
JP charters. Paul Powis,a good guy that knows his stuff,have known him for about 10 yrs.
How big is your group? I take up to 3 anglers. JP, Trophy Taker-Jeremy Brooks  and Jeff Anderson all do well.
